block.p: A roundup in the Sports section on June 30 about the top teams in the Tour de France referred incorrectly to Paolo Savoldelli's victories in the Giro d'Italia. He won in 2002 and 2005, but not in 2004. A graphic with the Tour standings on Wednesday reversed the team affiliations of David Zabriskie and George Hincapie. Zabriskie rides for CSC and Hincapie rides for Discovery Channel. (The error on Zabriskie was repeated in the chart on Thursday and yesterday.)

He won in 2002 and 2005, but not in 2004. A graphic with the Tour standings on Wednesday reversed the team affiliations of David Zabriskie and George Hincapie. Zabriskie rides for CSC and Hincapie rides for Discovery Channel. (The error on Zabriskie was repeated in the chart on Thursday and yesterday.)
